# PCA plot

A PCA plot of all samples.

```{r PCA}
#----- load DESeqDataSet
dds <- readRDS(subset(file_tab, step=="DESeq2" & extension=="rds" & contrast=="all")$filename)

#----- load DESeqDataSet
if (config$QC$samples_pca$transform_type=="normTransform") {
			dds_trans <- normTransform(dds) 
} else if (config$QC$samples_pca$transform_type=="vst") {
			dds_trans <- vst(dds, blind=FALSE) 
} else { 
			dds_trans <- rlog(dds, blind=FALSE)
}

#----- plot PCA
plotPCA(dds_trans, intgroup=config$QC$samples_pca$annotation_col)
```
